name: Rhythm Doctor Data File
summary: An RDSAVE file is a data file used by 7th Beat Games Rhythm Doctor, a rhythm-based video game. It stores data in a JSON-like format with names and values separated by colons (:). RDSAVE files may contain settings about the game (e.g., settings.rdsave ) or game save information (e.g., slot0.rdsave ).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
